sheet.structure: Form must use 'flex flex-col gap-4'. Body content wrapped in 'space-y-6 px-4'. SheetFooter must be OUTSIDE the body wrapper but inside Form.
sheet.padding: SheetHeader/SheetFooter use 'p-4'. SheetContent has NO default padding. Do not double pad Footer.

table.row_behavior: Do NOT add 'hover:bg-muted/50' or 'transition-colors' to TableRow instances (it is built-in).

layout.view_padding: Use 'p-4' for main view containers (not p-6). Avoid 'bg-muted/*' backgrounds on containers.
layout.toolbar: Do NOT add vertical padding (py-*) to Toolbars; rely on parent flex gap.
